SELECT COUNT(i_reser) FROM user_reser WHERE i_host IN( SELECT i_host FROM host_user WHERE i_user = #{i_user} ) AND ISNULL(reser_state)

SELECT a.i_reser, a.i_host, a.i_user,a.check_in AS chin,a.check_out AS chout, a.gest_qty AS qty , a.total_fee,a.reser_state, b.img_url, c.ROOM_TITLE,c.addr,DATE_FORMAT(a.R_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS R_DT, DATE_FORMAT(a.m_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS M_DT FROM user_reser a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) b ON a.i_host = b.i_host INNER JOIN host_user c ON a.i_host = c.I_HOST WHERE c.I_USER = ${i_user} AND a.check_out >= DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') AND ISNULL(a.reser_state) ORDER BY a.R_DT DESC

SELECT a.i_reser, a.i_host, a.i_user,a.check_in AS chin,a.check_out AS chout, a.gest_qty AS qty , a.total_fee, c.img_url, d.ROOM_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(a.R_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS R_DT, DATE_FORMAT(a.m_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS M_DT, d.BED_QTY, b.NM, b.PRO_IMG,e.live_type,e.typ,f.fee FROM user_reser a INNER JOIN t_user b ON a.I_USER = b.I_USER INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) c ON a.i_host = c.i_host INNER JOIN host_user d ON a.i_host = d.i_host INNER JOIN build_type e ON a.i_host= e.i_host INNER JOIN room_fee f ON a.I_HOST = f.i_host WHERE a.I_RESER = #{i_reser};

SELECT b.I_CANCEL, a.i_host, b.I_USER,d.nm, b.REASON, c.img_url,d.PRO_IMG, a.ROOM_TITLE, DATE_FORMAT(b.R_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS R_DT, DATE_FORMAT(b.m_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS M_DT FROM host_user a INNER JOIN user_rsv_cancel b ON a.I_HOST = b.i_host INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) c ON a.i_host = c.i_host INNER JOIN t_user d ON b.i_user = d.I_USER WHERE a.I_USER = ${i_user} AND b.STATE = 'o';

SELECT a.i_reser, a.i_host, a.i_user,a.check_in AS chin,a.check_out AS chout, a.gest_qty AS qty , a.total_fee,a.reser_state, b.img_url, c.ROOM_TITLE,c.addr,DATE_FORMAT(a.R_DT,'%Y-%m-%d') AS R_DT, DATE_FORMAT(a.m_dt,'%Y-%m-%d') AS M_DT FROM user_reser a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) b ON a.i_host = b.i_host INNER JOIN host_user c ON a.i_host = c.I_HOST WHERE c.I_USER = #{i_user} AND a.reser_state IN('cc','ch') ORDER BY a.R_DT asc

mapper.select: SELECT STRAIGHT_JOIN a.i_host, a.room_title FROM host_user a INNER JOIN build_type b ON a.i_host = b.i_host INNER JOIN check_inout c ON a.i_host = c.i_host INNER JOIN facilite d ON a.i_host = d.i_host INNER JOIN safe_plant e ON a.i_host = e.i_host INNER JOIN gest_space f ON a.i_host = f.I_HOST INNER JOIN space_info g ON a.i_host = g.i_host INNER JOIN room_rule h ON a.i_host = h.i_host INNER JOIN room_dt_rule i ON a.i_host = i.i_host INNER JOIN room_fee j ON a.i_host = j.i_host INNER JOIN workplace_ph k ON a.i_host = k.i_host INNER JOIN ( SELECT i_host FROM rooms_img GROUP BY i_host ) l ON a.i_host = l.i_host inner JOIN ( SELECT I_HOST FROM dtl_rule GROUP BY I_HOST ) m ON a.I_HOST = m.i_HOST WHERE a.i_user = #{i_user} ORDER BY a.M_DT ASC

SELECT SUBSTR(a.check_out,6) as check_out, a.fee AS b_fee, b.fee AS c_fee FROM ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(JOIN3.check_out,'%Y-%m') AS check_out, SUM(JOIN3.total_fee) AS fee FROM user_reser JOIN3 INNER JOIN host_user JOIN4 ON JOIN3.i_host = JOIN4.i_host WHERE JOIN4.i_user = #{i_user} AND JOIN3.reser_state IS NULL AND JOIN3.check_out LIKE '${check_out}%' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(JOIN3.check_out,'%Y-%m') ) a left JOIN ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(JOIN1.check_out,'%Y-%m') AS check_out, SUM(JOIN1.total_fee) AS fee FROM user_reser JOIN1 INNER JOIN host_user JOIN2 ON JOIN1.i_host = JOIN2.i_host WHERE JOIN2.i_user = #{i_user} AND JOIN1.reser_state = 'o' AND JOIN1.check_out LIKE '${check_out}%' GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(JOIN1.check_out,'%Y-%m') ) b ON a.check_out = b.check_out ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.check_out,'%Y-%m') ASC
